sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词或副词词组均有"立刻，马上"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: immediately, instantly, presently, directly, shortly, soon, at once, right away
means: immediately ： 指做完一件事后，立即就做另一件事，中间一般没有明显的时间间隔。
instantly ： 指恰恰就在此刻，一秒钟也没耽误。
shortly和soon同义，指动作发生或完成的速度之快。
soon ： 常用词，指行动快，完成速度快。
at once ： 口语中常用，语气强烈，指时间紧迫，一刻也不能耽误。
right away ： 主要用于美国英语，语气稍弱于at once，强调动作迅速。

data.mean: as soon as possible：今早，尽快

jx.jx_en_mean: used to convey that the second event mentioned happens immediately after the first

lj.lj_ly: she had no sooner spoken than the telephone rang.
lj.lj_ls: 她刚一说话，电话就响了。

jx.jx_en_mean: before much time has gone by

lj.lj_ly: I would be grateful if you would come to your senses sooner rather than later.
lj.lj_ls: 你要是能早点恢复理智我就谢天谢地了。

lj.lj_ly: No sooner was the frost off the ground than the work began.
lj.lj_ls: 地上的霜一消散，人们就开始工作了

lj.lj_ly: Sooner or later you will have to face the facts.

entry.def: If something is going to happen soon, it will happen after a short time. If something happened soon after a particular time or event, it happened a short time after it.

example.ex: You'll be hearing from us very soon...
example.tran: 你很快就会收到我们的来信。

example.ex: This chance has come sooner than I expected...
example.tran: 这个机会来得比我预想的要快。

entry.def: If you say that something happens as soon as something else happens, you mean that it happens immediately after the other thing.

example.ex: As soon as relations improve they will be allowed to go...
example.tran: 一旦关系有所改善，他们就可以获准离开。

example.ex: You'll never guess what happened as soon as I left my room.
example.tran: 你怎么也猜不出我一离开房间就发生了什么事。

entry.def: If you say that you would just as soon do something or you'd just as soon do it, you mean that you would prefer to do it.

example.ex: These people could afford to retire to Florida but they'd just as soon stay put...
example.tran: 这些人有足够的钱可以去佛罗里达安度退休生活，可是他们却宁愿留在原来的地方。

example.ex: I'd just as soon not have to make this public...
example.tran: 我宁愿不必将此事公之于众。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sōna 'immediately', of West Germanic origin

sentences.cn: 我们很快就要到家了。
sentences.en: We'll be home soon./We'll soon be home.

sentences.cn: 丈夫去世后不久，她就把房子卖了。
sentences.en: She sold the house soon after her husband died.

sentences.cn: 我很快意识到犯了错误。
sentences.en: I soon realized the mistake.

sentences.cn: 没多久便可清楚地看出，这个节目不受欢迎。
sentences.en: It soon became clear that the programme was a failure.

sentences.cn: 再见！
sentences.en: (informal) See you soon !

sentences.cn: 我们将尽快交货。
sentences.en: We'll deliver the goods as soon as we can.

sentences.cn: 请尽快把它寄出去。

sentences.cn: 做事果断: 买东西后立刻付帐, 饿了马上就吃饭.
sentences.en: Act decisively: to buy something immediately after payment, hungry for dinner soon.

sentences.cn: 吃完饭后,你立刻回去画画.
sentences.en: As soon as you are done you get right back to drawing.

sentences.cn: 犹大受了那点饼 、 立刻就出去. 那时候是夜间了.

sentences.en: Mr Darcy soon drew the attention of the room by his fine, tall person.

sentences.en: Mary clapped her hand over her mouth as soon as she realized what she had said.

sentences.cn: 他立刻把自已的意思讲明白了.
sentences.en: He soon made himself understood.

sentences.en: I will send the XXX as soon as possible after confirming remittance.

sentences.cn: 当一切就绪后, 他们立刻着手打井.
sentences.en: As soon as everything was ready, they started spudding in.

sentences.cn: 他进了屋,两位妇女立刻给他拜年.
sentences.en: As soon as he came in the two women wished him a happy New Year.

sentences.cn: 我们一相信,生命就立刻与上帝神圣的性情有分.
sentences.en: As soon as we believe our lives may begin to share in His divine nature.

sentences.cn: 他立刻发现一只黑色的大野鸭, 端庄悠闲地漂浮在水面上.
sentences.en: He soon saw a large black duck, floating in stately repose on the water.

sentences.cn: 她刚一走开,立刻就来了一个姑娘同一个小孩, 喘着气,流着汗.
sentences.en: She was no sooner gone but comes a wench and a child, puffing and sweating.

sentences.cn: 电流一接通,机器就立刻开始运转.
sentences.en: The machine will start running as soon as the electric current is turned on.

sentences.cn: 她坚持, 只要学校一放假, 我就立刻去按人家的门铃卖杂志.
sentences.en: She insisted that, as soon as school was over, I start ringing doorbells, selling magazines.

sentences.en: A crowd soon collects when there's a street accident.

sentences.cn: 你从总公司得到消息后立刻告知我们,好 吗 ?
sentences.en: A: Please let us know as soon as you hear from your home office?

sentences.cn: 当她打开大门的时候,那只狗立刻向她扑过来.
sentences.en: The dog went for her as soon as she opened the gate.

sentences.cn: 她一进来, 立刻跑向楼梯.
sentences.en: As soon as she entered, she hurried up the stairs.

sentences.cn: 请尽快给我寄钱过来, 我就可以立刻开始我的慢跑啦.
sentences.en: Please send money as soon as possible, so I can start my jogging right away.

sentences.cn: 那艘船一办好离港手续立刻启航了.
sentences.en: The ship sailed as soon as it got clearance.

sentences.cn: 如果不立刻交纳罚金, 他将会受到法官的审判.
sentences.en: If he doesn't pay the fine soon, he'll be up before the magistrate.

sentences.cn: 当这本书有货的时候,立刻去买.
sentences.en: Go and get the book as soon as possible when it is in stock.

sentences.cn: 我坚持要立刻取回我的退款.
sentences.en: I will insist upon getting my refund soon.

sentences.cn: 一群人马上围了.
sentences.en: A crowd soon round.

sentences.cn: 美国人说马上将这些紫铜钉改为黄铜钉.
sentences.en: American speech soon changed the words copper bolts into brass tacks.

sentences.cn: 补救原则: 出现异常时, 马上退出并给出足够的错误信息.
sentences.en: Rule of Repair: When you must fail , fail noisily and as soon as possible.

sentences.cn: 圣诞节马上就要来到了.
sentences.en: The Christmas holiday will soon be upon us.

sentences.cn: 人们担心有效的正确措施不可能马上制定出来.
sentences.en: People worry that effective corrective measures will not be instituted soon enough.

sentences.cn: 他坐在后座,马上就觉得很困倦.
sentences.en: He sat in the back seat and soon felt very sleepy.

sentences.cn: 他见事情已经失败便马上飞往开罗.
sentences.en: As soon as the jig was up, he flew of to Cairo.

sentences.cn: 我一踏进里面, 眼镜马上蒙了一层雾.
sentences.en: As soon as I stepped inside, my glasses misted over.

sentences.en: The capital will be captured soon, so the emperor has to go into exile.

sentences.en: He clapped up an excuse, but this was soon seen through.

sentences.cn: 我认为这种印象不会马上就消逝的.
sentences.en: I do not think the impression will soon be over.

sentences.cn: 我一到达家, 就会马上打电话给你.
sentences.en: As soon as I arrive at home, I will telephone you.

sentences.cn: 但是我马上就要离开这里了,我急需我的身份证.
sentences.en: But I'm leaving soon and I need my identity card badly.

sentences.cn: 他把所有的习作都拿给编辑,希望能马上发表一篇.
sentences.en: He crowded in all his writings upon the editor hoping one published soon.

sentences.cn: 我们一旦收到你们的信用证,就马上装船.
sentences.en: We can ship them as soon as we receive your L / C.

sentences.cn: 她马上就回来.

sentences.cn: 你安排妥当以后,马上就来.
sentences.en: Come as soon as you can straighten things out.

sentences.cn: 我们的一个朋友马上就来.
sentences.en: A friend of oursis coming soon.

sentences.cn: 一听到这消息他马上就赶去了.
sentences.en: As soon as he heard the news, he was off like a shot.

sentences.cn: 这是在奥林匹克运动会上, 而且马上就轮到他出场了.
sentences.en: These were the Olympic Games, and soon it would be his moment to take center stage.

sentences.cn: 现在天色阴沉, 不过我想马上就会转晴的.
sentences.en: The sky is overcast now, but I think it will clear up soon.

sentences.cn: 这是一场分秒必争的赛跑,看医生是否能马上赶到失事的地点来挽救那个受伤的人.
sentences.en: It was a race against the clock whether the doctor would get to the accident soon enough to save the injured man.

sentences.cn: 我们一俟租到船, 会马上告诉你们.
sentences.en: As soon as we have the opportunity to book a vessel, we will let you know.

sentences.cn: 因此, 国王马上就放弃了一切皇家的荣誉,开始修行.
sentences.en: Therefore, soon after this incident the king renounced all royal grandeur and got initiated to monkshood.

sentences.cn: 完成这项工作后我马上就要出去.
sentences.en: I have got to go out as soon as this job is done.

sentences.cn: 我们马上就会听到关于《圣经》教训的另一种解释.
sentences.en: We should soon have another version of the scripture doctrine.

sentences.cn: 考虑到天气的恶劣,我们应马上动身.
sentences.en: Allowing for the bad weather we should set off soon.

sentences.cn: 该犯定罪后马上被关进了监狱.
sentences.en: The criminal was flung into prison as soon as he was found guilty.

sentences.cn: 男孩晕过去了, 可是,一会儿就醒了过来.
sentences.en: The boy had a swoon, but soon came round.

sentences.cn: 熊快速地离开了,不一会儿,就消失在树林里.
sentences.en: The bear trotted quickly away and was soon hidden by the trees.

sentences.en: Put the damp clothes on a hot kang and they'll soon dry.

sentences.cn: 可能一会儿就枯萎了.
sentences.en: Soon it would shrivel away.

sentences.cn: 你的烤土豆一会儿就好.

sentences.cn: 一会儿他们来到手术室.

sentences.cn: 这么早就走? 不能再呆一会儿 吗 ?

sentences.cn: 不一会儿, 小帆船绕过海角,不见了踪影.

sentences.cn: 我们有时也发生争吵, 但一会儿就没事了.

sentences.en: I am trying a job as a translator and I have the important first interview soon.

sentences.cn: 几只强壮的胳膊不一会儿就把小船划到了印奇角礁石那儿.

sentences.cn: 到底鹿死谁手, 一会儿就见分晓了.
sentences.en: As to who will win the prize , we'll find out soon.

sentences.cn: 不一会儿就给换了一个空篓子.

sentences.cn: 不多一会儿,睡梦象云彩似的笼罩了他们.

sentences.cn: 这地方人那么多, 一会儿我们就看不见他了.

sentences.cn: 他刚出门, 一会儿就回来.
sentences.en: He's just gone out; he'll be back soon.

sentences.cn: 一会儿天阴得很黑;紧跟着就是打雷打闪.

sentences.cn: 丈夫去世后不久，她就把房子卖了。
sentences.en: She sold the house soon after her husband died.

sentences.cn: 例如，1975年《商业周刊》曾预测，电子支付手段不久将“彻底改变货币本身的概念”，结果几年后却自食其言。
sentences.en: For example, Business Week predicted in 1975 that electronic means of payment would soon “revolutionize the very concept of money itself,” only to reverseitself several years later.

sentences.cn: ②近十年前就有人预言，流行情景喜剧《老友记》的观众不久就可以通过点击几下遥控器来购买一件Jennifer Aniston 的同款毛衣了。
sentences.en: Nearly a decade ago it was predicted that viewers of “Friends”, a popular situation comedy, would soon be able to purchase a sweater like Jennifer Aniston’s with a few taps on their remote control.

sentences.en: The hydrofoil soon speeded up.

sentences.en: The crew pulled away and soon caught up with the other boat.

sentences.cn: 不久他就被任命为上海市长.
sentences.en: Soon he was appointed mayor of Shanghai.

sentences.cn: 喜讯不久就传开了.
sentences.en: The happy tidings soon got abroad.

sentences.cn: 不久她又反对一个在多伦多的公路计划.
sentences.en: Soon she was fighting a road plan in Toronto.

sentences.cn: 我们希望你幸福并且希望在不久的将来再次听到你.
sentences.en: We wish you all the best and I hope to hear you again soon.

sentences.cn: 可是新婚不久, 丈夫就作出了对不起妻子的事.
sentences.en: Newly married but soon, the husband made a sorry cuckoldry matter.

sentences.cn: 不久雨就下大了.
sentences.en: Soon it began to rain heavily.

sentences.cn: 他们不久就在一起谈起来了.

sentences.cn: 不久她看到一个小孩坐在路旁.

sentences.cn: 过不久标题休假?
sentences.en: Heading off on vacation soon?

sentences.cn: 我希望不久就能和父母亲在一起.
sentences.en: I look to be with my parents soon.

sentences.cn: 这些人有足够的钱可以去佛罗里达安度退休生活，可是他们却宁愿留在原来的地方。
sentences.en: These people could afford to retire to Florida but they'd just as soon stay put...

sentences.cn: 我宁愿不必将此事公之于众。
sentences.en: I'd just as soon not have to make this public...

sentences.cn: 我宁愿把这件事推到明天去做,也不愿今天做.
sentences.en: I would as soon put it off until tomorrow as do it today.

sentences.cn: 我们宁愿呆在家里也不愿出去散步.
sentences.en: We would just as soon stay at home as go a walk.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿他置身于争论之外.
sentences.en: I had just as soon he stayed out of the quarrel.

sentences.cn: 这个我还是宁愿不做.
sentences.en: I would sooner not do it.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿吃泥巴也不会骗你.
sentences.en: I'd sooner eat dirt if I ever lie to you.

sentences.cn: 内森·黑尔宁愿死得英雄,也不愿苟且偷生.
sentences.en: Nathan Hale would sooner die a hero than drag out an ignoble existence.

sentences.cn: 他宁愿换个工作干,也不为那个老板工作.
sentences.en: He'll change his job sooner than work for that boss.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿你不曾告诉我这件事.
sentences.en: I would as soon you didn't tell me about it.

sentences.cn: 他宁愿以半价而不愿让他们烂掉.
sentences.en: He sold the vegetables at half price sooner than allow them to go bad.

sentences.cn: 他宁愿让这世界化成灰烬.
sentences.en: Sooner let the world turn to drifting powder.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿死也不会放弃.
sentences.en: I'd sooner die than give up.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿呆在家里也不愿去跳舞.
sentences.en: I had sooner stay home than dance.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿住在城里不愿住在农场.
sentences.en: I had sooner live in the city than on a farm.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿做那件事.
sentences.en: I would as soon do it as not.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿留下不走.
sentences.en: I would as soon as stay.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿在家看电视.
sentences.en: I would just as soon stay home and watch television.

sentences.cn: 如果我是个年轻人，我宁愿进监狱也不愿为这个国家打仗。
sentences.en: If I were a young man I would sooner go to prison than fight for this country.

sentences.cn: 在我跟皮特说之前，我宁愿他不知道这件事。
sentences.en: I'd sooner he didn't know till I've talked to Pete.

sentences.en: These people could afford to retire to Florida but they'd just as soon stay put.
